sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: The authors are grateful to the Kyushu Environmental Evaluation Association, Fukuoka City Government Green City Promotion Department, and Yu-Lin Chen of the Faculty of Design, Kyushu University for support in accessing relevant documentation; and to the Fukuoka Prefecture Center for Climate Change Actions for facilitating a group discussion with local climate change practitioners which greatly helped to refine the findings.

sec.title: Funding sources
sec.p: This work was supported by a Wellcome Trust Seed Award in Humanities and Social Sciences [Grant Number 205764-Z-16-Z].
